mapper.select: select DISTINCT pack.PACKAGE_CODE, pack.package_price,pack.package_name ,city.CITY_NAME,img.IMG_PATH from tb_package pack inner join tb_air air on pack.DEPARTURE_AIR_CODE = air.air_code inner join tb_city city on air.ARRIVAL_CITY_code = city.city_code inner join tb_theme thm on city.city_code = thm.city_code inner join tb_img_group img on thm.theme_code = img.theme_code where pack.PACKAGE_NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or city.CITY_NAME like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%'

select DISTINCT pack.PACKAGE_CODE, pack.package_price,pack.package_name ,city.CITY_NAME,img.IMG_PATH,air.start_date from tb_package pack inner join tb_air air on pack.DEPARTURE_AIR_CODE = air.air_code inner join tb_city city on air.ARRIVAL_CITY_code = city.city_code inner join tb_theme thm on city.city_code = thm.city_code inner join tb_img_group img on thm.theme_code = img.theme_code
AND pack.PACKAGE_NAME like '%' || #{dkeyword} || '%' OR city.CITY_NAME like '%'|| #{dkeyword} || '%'
AND air.start_date between #{startDate} AND #{endDate} or air.end_date between #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND pack.package_price <= 500000
OR pack.package_price between 500000 and 1000000
OR pack.package_price between 1000000 and 2000000
OR pack.package_price between 2000000 and 3000000
OR pack.package_price >= 3000000
AND air.DEPARTURE_CITY_CODE = #{cityCode}

select DISTINCT pack.PACKAGE_CODE, pack.package_price,pack.package_name ,city.CITY_NAME,img.IMG_PATH,air.start_date from tb_package pack inner join tb_air air on pack.DEPARTURE_AIR_CODE = air.air_code inner join tb_city city on air.ARRIVAL_CITY_code = city.city_code inner join tb_theme thm on city.city_code = thm.city_code inner join tb_img_group img on thm.theme_code = img.theme_code
order by pack.PACKAGE_PRICE
order by pack.PACKAGE_PRICE desc
